memberdef.definition: std::set< std::tuple< Atom::AtomType, std::string, std::string, double > > SmolDock::Atom::AtomTypeLabel
memberdef.name: AtomTypeLabel

briefdescription.para: Construct atom from symbol (C,O,N), lower-case atom name (carbon, hydrogen) or optionnally PDB file symbol (CA,NZ, ...)

parameterdescription.para: Either a one-letter symbol, lower-case atom name, or a PDB file symbol.
